item.title: Yennai Arindhaal is by far Ajith’s best work: Gautham Menon
item.dc:creator: Only Kollywood
item.description:
Gautham Menon says Yennai Arindhaal is by far Ajith’s best work. Gautham adds there are many applause-worthy moments in the film. “In Arrambam, there is a moment when he looks sharply at someone touching his shoulder. I have loved some of the moments from his earlier films. These are there but the audience will forget they are watching ...

The post Yennai Arindhaal is by far Ajith’s best work: Gautham Menon appeared first on Only Kollywood.
item.content:encoded:
Gautham Menon says Yennai Arindhaal is by far Ajith’s best work. Gautham adds there are many applause-worthy moments in the film. “In Arrambam, there is a moment when he looks sharply at someone touching his shoulder. I have loved some of the moments from his earlier films. These are there but the audience will forget they are watching an Ajith film 15 minutes into it,” says Gautham Menon.

“I have made a couple of bold moves in this film, which is in the modern space. Even though we haven’t shown anything happening and it has been left to the audience’s imagination,” adds Gautham.

Yennai Arindhaal is slated for worldwide release tomorrow and the world’s first premiere is scheduled to happen tonight in Dubai at 12 AM IST.

The post Yennai Arindhaal is by far Ajith’s best work: Gautham Menon appeared first on Only Kollywood.

item.title: Ajith thinks Yennai Arindhaal is really good: Dan Macarthur
item.dc:creator: Only Kollywood

The post Ajith thinks Yennai Arindhaal is really good: Dan Macarthur appeared first on Only Kollywood.
item.content:encoded:
There is a lot of buzz and euphoria around Yennai Arindhaal from various quarters. Australian cinematographer Dan Macarthur has taken to his official social media page and revealed what Ajith has told him after watching the film. “Have fun tomw #thala fans! Ill be watching the film in Brisbane. Ajith told me he thinks the film is really good ,” posted Dan.

The early morning shows are starting as early as around 4 AM in Chennai and the world’s first premiere show will happen tonight at 12 AM IST in Dubai. Stay tuned to Only Kollywood for the first-on-net review of the film!

The post Ajith thinks Yennai Arindhaal is really good: Dan Macarthur appeared first on Only Kollywood.
